description.narrative: Operating Costs, which contributes to Field/Country Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Supply And Logistics, Unicef Capacity For Supply And Logistics. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The right to protection and participation of effected children and youth in the camps promoted and implemented.

sector.narrative: CO/RO Supply - technical assistance and collaboration in supply chain, procurement of goods and services, and logistics
Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)
Management and Operations support at CO

description.narrative: Development Partner affairs policy planning and administration

title.narrative: Turkey United Nations Development Assistance Framework

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: % of Office Management Committees fully functioning as per ToRs established
Timely completion of bidding processes and CRCs
